channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta's stock drop tells the wrong story on earnings — so, we're boosting our price target
item.description: Don't let the after-hours stock action fool you, Meta delivered one heck of a strong quarter and rosy revenue guidance.

item.title: We reiterate our 1 rating on Microsoft despite its softer guidance — here's why
item.description: The numbers look different this quarter due the company re-segmenting a few businesses, but overall there's not much to complain about.

item.title: Dow, Nasdaq Futures Fall; Meta, Microsoft Sell Off
item.description: Nasdaq-100 futures were leading losses premarket, down roughly 1%, as investors scoured afterhours results from Microsoft and Meta Platforms.

item.title: Sterling Could Rise Further on Prospects of Moderate BOE Rate Cuts
item.description: Sterling was a touch higher against the dollar and UBS said relatively higher U.K. interest rates compared with rates elsewhere, should favor the poun...

item.title: Dodge maker Stellantis posts 27% drop in revenues, flags progress in slashing U.S. inventories
item.description: Auto giant Stellantis on Thursday reported a 27% decline in third-quarter revenues, but said it was making headway in addressing operational issues li...

item.title: Meta and Microsoft: AI's Spending Champs Won't Be Tapping the Brakes.
item.description: Sharply rising capital investments show no sign of slowing as the latest reports fail to excite investors.

item.title: Samsung Electronics' chip profit shrinks 40% from the previous quarter
item.description: The semiconductor unit reported third-quarter operating profit of 3.86 trillion won (about $2.8 billion), down 40% from the previous quarter.

item.title: Oil giant Shell posts $6 billion profit beat, launches new share buyback program
item.description: British oil giant Shell on Thursday posted a small year-on-year drop in third-quarter profit as a sharp drop in crude prices was offset by higher gas ...

item.title: Oil Edges Higher on Demand Optimism
item.description: Oil prices edged higher in Europe, supported by positive signs on U.S. fuel demand and improvements in top crude importer China.and a Reuters report t...

item.title: Gold Supported by Macro Risks, U.S. Election Uncertainty
item.description: Gold edged lower but hovered around record highs, with ANZ Research saying the market appears to be positioning for a high level of uncertainty ahead ...
